name: Motu Partly - Furfari Nager
description:
controls

W,s,a,d = walk

Shift+w =run fast

Space = Jump

Esc = exit game

It's not a fully playable game because  I made it in 1 day so I am unable 5o finish this project . I will make it full version after March 2022 when my exams over.

You can give your ideas in comments sections. I will add them in game.
